interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: OZNaturals Tinted Moisturizer, SPF 30 Sunscreen. Broad Spectrum Protection. Zinc Oxide + Minerals In This Tinted Sunscreen Protects, Moisturizes And Blends Well To Provide A Rich, Youthful Glow!
Review Date: 2015/08/28
Store: OZ Naturals
Product Description: ['Skin care experts and dermatologists are in agreement on the importance of wearing sunscreen. \xa0Most premature aging of the skin is caused by sun exposure. “Photo aging,” as is it known in skin care circles, includes wrinkles, freckles, age spots, blotchy complexion, dullness, sagging skin and rough, leathery texture. \xa0In other words, just about every complaint surrounding aging skin can be traced at least in part to sun exposure, making daily sunscreen protection with an SPF 30 sunscreen a must. But not all sunscreens are created equal. \xa0OZNaturals Age Defying Solar Shield SPF 30 Broad Spectrum Tinted Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide provides broad spectrum protection from the sun’s harmful UVA/UVB rays, while moisturizing skin with a healthy-looking hint of color. Utilizing the highly stable and reflective properties of Zinc Oxide, with the natural UV diluting qualities of Octyl Methoxycinnamate, our formula offers sheer, broad-spectrum UV coverage in a luxurious tinted moisturizer formulation.']
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Sun Protection Factor': '30 Sun Protection Factor (SPF)', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.5 x 3.5 x 1 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'I1-7LV1-6RQ9', 'UPC': '638317780652', 'Manufacturer': 'OZ Naturals, LLC'}
Review Text: First  of  all  let  me  tell  you that  this  product  is paraben, sulfate, mineral  oil, and lanolin  free. It can  be  applied  all  over  your  body  as well  as worn like  foundation  or under your  makeup. This sunscreen  has a brownish  tint to it and it blends  with  ease. I do wish  it was a little  darker. The consistency  is creamy  but not oily. I wish  the scent  was a bit stronger. I find  this  product  to  be  really  moisturizing. I received  this  product  for  free  in  exchange  for  an  honest  review.
Review Title: A little  tint alotta  moisture!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
OZNaturals Body Butter – This Natural Body Moisturizer Contains Sweet Almond & Macadamia Nut - This Luxurious Skin Moisturizer Will Provide Your Body With A Healthy Vibrant Glow!
MUPATER
['Size:30ML PuriDerma scar removal cream is highly effective in fading away scars from acne, cuts, stretch marks, C-sections, and surgeries.']
{'Brand': 'MUPATER', 'Scent': 'Almond', 'Item Form': 'Butter', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 1 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer recommended age': '6 months - 3 years', 'Item model number': '04-KPOU-1KSA', 'UPC': '616806598506 885337394905', 'Manufacturer': 'OZ Naturals'}
My body butter arrived  a few days ago and I decided  to use it daily  on my entire  body. I love  the fact that  this  lotion  features  key ingredients  such  as Shea Butter, avocado  oil, and kukui nut oil. I applied  it every  night  before  bed. This butter  is super  rich  and  moisturizing. My legs were starting  to have  that  alligator  look and now they don't. I wish  this  scent was way stronger. It's to faint for me. Also this  butter absorbs  at a slower rate. That's why  I  choose  to apply  at night. I received  this  product  for  free  in  exchange  for  an  honest  review.
Super  rich!!
OZNaturals Tinted Moisturizer, SPF 30 Sunscreen. Broad Spectrum Protection. Zinc Oxide + Minerals In This Tinted Sunscreen Protects, Moisturizes And Blends Well To Provide A Rich, Youthful Glow!
OZ Naturals
['Skin care experts and dermatologists are in agreement on the importance of wearing sunscreen. \xa0Most premature aging of the skin is caused by sun exposure. “Photo aging,” as is it known in skin care circles, includes wrinkles, freckles, age spots, blotchy complexion, dullness, sagging skin and rough, leathery texture. \xa0In other words, just about every complaint surrounding aging skin can be traced at least in part to sun exposure, making daily sunscreen protection with an SPF 30 sunscreen a must. But not all sunscreens are created equal. \xa0OZNaturals Age Defying Solar Shield SPF 30 Broad Spectrum Tinted Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide provides broad spectrum protection from the sun’s harmful UVA/UVB rays, while moisturizing skin with a healthy-looking hint of color. Utilizing the highly stable and reflective properties of Zinc Oxide, with the natural UV diluting qualities of Octyl Methoxycinnamate, our formula offers sheer, broad-spectrum UV coverage in a luxurious tinted moisturizer formulation.']

First  of  all  let  me  tell  you that  this  product  is paraben, sulfate, mineral  oil, and lanolin  free. It can  be  applied  all  over  your  body  as well  as worn like  foundation  or under your  makeup. This sunscreen  has a brownish  tint to it and it blends  with  ease. I do wish  it was a little  darker. The consistency  is creamy  but not oily. I wish  the scent  was a bit stronger. I find  this  product  to  be  really  moisturizing. I received  this  product  for  free  in  exchange  for  an  honest  review.

profile:
**User Summary:**

The user has a strong preference for natural, moisturizing products that include ingredients like Shea Butter, avocado oil, and nut oils, which they find effective in combating dry skin and improving texture. They prioritize deep nourishment at night, showcasing a routine focused on hydration. Recent interactions suggest an increasing interest in multifunctional products that not only moisturize but also provide sun protection and a hint of color.

While the user appreciates effective moisturizers, they maintain a desire for stronger scents in their applications, reflecting their enhanced sensory experience preference. Their relatively high ratings indicate overall satisfaction with product performance, even if it comes with slower absorption rates. 

A recent experience with a tinted moisturizer aligns with their values, as they appreciated its moisturizing capabilities and the absence of harsh ingredients. However, the user expressed a wish for darker tint options and stronger scent profiles, reinforcing their ongoing quest for products that meet both functional and sensory expectations.

Overall, the user values effectiveness, natural ingredients, and enhanced sensory experiences in their skincare regimen, while increasingly seeking products that offer broad-spectrum sun protection along with rich hydration.
